answers.answer: I am 32 weeks and have Gestational diabetes in having a boy I was diagnosed at 26 weeks it's been okay just sticking to my diet had an anatomy scan yesterday they say baby weighs 4.9 pounds doc is not concerned and everything is doing great
Thats amazing to hear i just found out i have diabetes i felt so down and horrbile im having a boy and i have to have a scan next week to see how things going wish u all best
